T02D2729:107a-1: lo ke shva r'a ya sto tra /
T02D2729:107a-3: 'jig rten dbang phyug la bstod pa /
T02D2729:107a-4: 'jig rten dbang phyug la phyag 'tshal lo //
T02D2729:107a-5: 'jig rten bla mas gsum gyis phyag byas //
T02D2729:107a-6: lha dbang tshangs pa ma chog gis bstod pa ste //
T02D2729:107a-7: thub mchog rgyal po myur du dngos grub stsol //
T02D2729:107a-8: spyan ras gzigs mgon mchog la phyag 'tshal lo //
T02D2729:107a-9: bde gshegs rang bzhin bdud rtsi'i ngo bo 'chang //
T02D2729:107a-10: sna tshogs mtshan gyis spras pa'i sku lus mchog / bde gshegs 'od dpag med pa'i dbu rgyan can //
T02D2729:107a-11: gser gyi padmas g-yon gyi phyag brgyan pa //
T02D2729:107a-12: dri med ral pa 'khyil nag cung zad ser //
T02D2729:107a-13: zla ba'i dbyibs 'dra gsal zhing rdzogs pa'i zhal //
T02D2729:107a-14: padma ltar yangs mchog tu mdzes pa'i spyan //
T02D2729:107a-15: mkhur ba gangs kyi dum bu lta bur dkar //
T02D2729:107a-16: ri dvags rgyal po'i dga' bzhin zhal sgros dmar //
T02D2729:107a-17: nyi ma 'char ka ltar dmar btsod kyi mdog /
T02D2729:107a-18: padma gzhon nu lta bur mchu dmar la //
T02D2729:107a-19: ston ka'i sprin tshogs lta bur sgra sgrogs pa //
T02D2729:107a-20: dpung gnyis sna tshogs mtshan gyis mdzes pa ste //
T02D2729:107a-21: phyag mthil padma gzhon nu lta bur 'jam //
T02D2729:107a-22: ri dvags pags pa sku yi stod na man pas //
T02D2729:107a-23: snyan gnyis rna rgyan g-yo zhing mdzes pa mda' //
T02D2729:107a-24: phyag ni yangs shing lte ba zab pa ste //
T02D2729:107a-25: padma dri ma med pa lta bu lags //
T02D2729:107a-26: gser mchog sku rags nor bu'i rgyan ldan pa //
T02D2729:107a-27: na bza' mdzes pas sku yi smad brgyan pa //
T02D2729:107a-28: rgyal ba ye shes rgya mtsho'i pha rol phyin //
T02D2729:107a-29: bsod nams du ma las ni 'khrungs pa'i mgon //
T02D2729:107a-30: rims dang nad 'joms bde ba mchog bskyed pa //
T02D2729:107a-31: srid pa mthar mdzad mkha' la rgyu ba dang //
T02D2729:107a-32: kun tu rgyu ba'i sku mchog la bstod pa //
T02D2729:107a-33: bdud rigs sna tshogs stobs ni nges par 'joms //
T02D2729:107a-34: zhabs mchog rkang gdub mchog gi sgra sgrogs la //
T02D2729:107a-35: glang po dregs dang ngang pa'i stabs su gshegs //
T02D2729:107b-0: bdud rtsi chen po thugs chung yongs rdzogs @107b brnyas //
T02D2729:107b-1: gser bzhin rtag tu dgyes pa'i rgyan mnga' ba //
T02D2729:107b-2: ri bo gru 'dzin ni dgyes par bzhugs //
T02D2729:107b-3: 'jig rten dbang phyug khyed la rab tu bstod //
